title: Smart Home Automation System
description: IoT-based home automation system with voice control, mobile app interface, and energy monitoring capabilities. Features include automated lighting, climate control, security system integration, and real-time energy consumption tracking.
team_members: Sarah Johnson, Mike Chen, Alex Rodriguez

title: Neural Network-Based ECG Analysis
description: Deep learning system for automated ECG signal analysis and arrhythmia detection using convolutional neural networks. Achieves 96% accuracy in detecting various cardiac abnormalities from ECG waveforms.
team_members: Dr. Emily Watson, James Park, Lisa Zhang

title: 5G Beamforming Simulator
description: MATLAB-based simulation environment for 5G massive MIMO beamforming algorithms. Includes implementation of various precoding techniques and performance analysis under different channel conditions.

title: Autonomous Drone Navigation
description: Computer vision-based autonomous drone navigation system using real-time object detection and path planning algorithms. Capable of obstacle avoidance and target tracking in GPS-denied environments.
team_members: David Lee, Amanda Foster, Kevin Wu

title: FPGA-Based Digital Filter Design
description: High-performance digital signal processing implementation on FPGA featuring configurable FIR and IIR filters with real-time audio processing capabilities.

title: Blockchain-Based IoT Security
description: Secure IoT communication framework using blockchain technology for device authentication and data integrity in smart city applications.
team_members: Hassan Ali, Rachel Green, Tom Wilson

title: Radar Signal Processing Platform
description: Real-time radar signal processing system for target detection and tracking using advanced signal processing algorithms and software-defined radio.
team_members: Captain Steve Rogers, Dr. Tony Stark

title: Wireless Power Transfer System
description: Efficient wireless power transfer system design using magnetic resonance coupling for electric vehicle charging applications.
